title: VK API JSON Schema - methods
description: Contains JSON Schema documents explaining the VK.COM API - methods

methods.name: groups.addLink
methods.description: Allows to add a link to the community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: link
parameters.description: Link URL.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: Description text for the link.

methods.name: groups.approveRequest
methods.description: Allows to approve join request to the community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

methods.name: groups.create
methods.description: Creates a new community.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Community title.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Community description (ignored for 'type' = 'public').

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Community type. Possible values: *'group' - group,, *'event' - event,, *'public' - public page

parameters.name: public_category
parameters.description: Category ID (for 'type' = 'public' only).

parameters.name: public_subcategory
parameters.description: Public page subcategory ID.

parameters.name: subtype
parameters.description: Public page subtype. Possible values: *'1' - place or small business,, *'2' - company, organization or website,, *'3' - famous person or group of people,, *'4' - product or work of art.

methods.name: groups.deleteLink
methods.description: Allows to delete a link from the community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: link_id
parameters.description: Link ID.

methods.name: groups.edit
methods.description: Edits a community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: Community title.

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: Community description.

parameters.name: screen_name
parameters.description: Community screen name.

parameters.name: access
parameters.description: Community type. Possible values: *'0' - open,, *'1' - closed,, *'2' - private.

parameters.name: website
parameters.description: Website that will be displayed in the community information field.

parameters.name: subject
parameters.description: Community subject. Possible values: , *'1' - auto/moto,, *'2' - activity holidays,, *'3' - business,, *'4' - pets,, *'5' - health,, *'6' - dating and communication, , *'7' - games,, *'8' - IT (computers and software),, *'9' - cinema,, *'10' - beauty and fashion,, *'11' - cooking,, *'12' - art and culture,, *'13' - literature,, *'14' - mobile services and internet,, *'15' - music,, *'16' - science and technology,, *'17' - real estate,, *'18' - news and media,, *'19' - security,, *'20' - education,, *'21' - home and renovations,, *'22' - politics,, *'23' - food,, *'24' - industry,, *'25' - travel,, *'26' - work,, *'27' - entertainment,, *'28' - religion,, *'29' - family,, *'30' - sports,, *'31' - insurance,, *'32' - television,, *'33' - goods and services,, *'34' - hobbies,, *'35' - finance,, *'36' - photo,, *'37' - esoterics,, *'38' - electronics and appliances,, *'39' - erotic,, *'40' - humor,, *'41' - society, humanities,, *'42' - design and graphics.

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Organizer email (for events).

parameters.name: phone
parameters.description: Organizer phone number (for events).

parameters.name: rss
parameters.description: RSS feed address for import (available only to communities with special permission. Contact vk.com/support to get it.

parameters.name: event_start_date
parameters.description: Event start date in Unixtime format.

parameters.name: event_finish_date
parameters.description: Event finish date in Unixtime format.

parameters.name: event_group_id
parameters.description: Organizer community ID (for events only).

parameters.name: public_category
parameters.description: Public page category ID.

parameters.name: public_subcategory
parameters.description: Public page subcategory ID.

parameters.name: public_date
parameters.description: Founding date of a company or organization owning the community in "dd.mm.YYYY" format.

parameters.name: wall
parameters.description: Wall settings. Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - open,, *'2' - limited (groups and events only),, *'3' - closed (groups and events only).

parameters.name: topics
parameters.description: Board topics settings. Possbile values: , *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - open,, *'2' - limited (for groups and events only).

parameters.name: photos
parameters.description: Photos settings. Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - open,, *'2' - limited (for groups and events only).

parameters.name: video
parameters.description: Video settings. Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - open,, *'2' - limited (for groups and events only).

parameters.name: audio
parameters.description: Audio settings. Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - open,, *'2' - limited (for groups and events only).

parameters.name: links
parameters.description: Links settings (for public pages only). Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - enabled.

parameters.name: events
parameters.description: Events settings (for public pages only). Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - enabled.

parameters.name: places
parameters.description: Places settings (for public pages only). Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - enabled.

parameters.name: contacts
parameters.description: Contacts settings (for public pages only). Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - enabled.

parameters.name: docs
parameters.description: Documents settings. Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - open,, *'2' - limited (for groups and events only).

parameters.name: wiki
parameters.description: Wiki pages settings. Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - open,, *'2' - limited (for groups and events only).

parameters.name: messages
parameters.description: Community messages. Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - enabled.

parameters.name: age_limits
parameters.description: Community age limits. Possible values: *'1' - no limits,, *'2' - 16+,, *'3' - 18+.

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: Market settings. Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - enabled.

parameters.name: market_buttons
parameters.description: Buttons details, see market/objects.json#/definitions/market_custom_button

parameters.name: market_comments
parameters.description: market comments settings. Possible values: *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - enabled.

parameters.name: market_country
parameters.description: Market delivery countries.

parameters.name: market_city
parameters.description: Market delivery cities (if only one country is specified).

parameters.name: market_currency
parameters.description: Market currency settings. Possbile values: , *'643' - Russian rubles,, *'980' - Ukrainian hryvnia,, *'398' - Kazakh tenge,, *'978' - Euro,, *'840' - US dollars

parameters.name: market_contact
parameters.description: Seller contact for market. Set '0' for community messages.

parameters.name: market_wiki
parameters.description: ID of a wiki page with market description.

parameters.name: obscene_filter
parameters.description: Obscene expressions filter in comments. Possible values: , *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - enabled.

parameters.name: obscene_stopwords
parameters.description: Stopwords filter in comments. Possible values: , *'0' - disabled,, *'1' - enabled.

parameters.name: obscene_words
parameters.description: Keywords for stopwords filter.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: Country of the community.

parameters.name: city
parameters.description: City of the community.

methods.name: groups.editLink
methods.description: Allows to edit a link in the community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: link_id
parameters.description: Link ID.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: New description text for the link.

methods.name: groups.editManager
methods.description: Allows to add, remove or edit the community manager.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

parameters.name: role
parameters.description: Manager role. Possible values: *'moderator',, *'editor',, *'administrator',, *'advertiser'.

parameters.name: is_call_operator
parameters.description: '1' â€” allow the manager to accept community calls.

parameters.name: is_contact
parameters.description: '1' - to show the manager in Contacts block of the community.

parameters.name: contact_position
parameters.description: Position to show in Contacts block.

parameters.name: contact_phone
parameters.description: Contact phone.

parameters.name: contact_email
parameters.description: Contact e-mail.

methods.name: groups.get
methods.description: Returns a list of the communities to which a user belongs.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return complete information about a user's communities, '0' - to return a list of community IDs without any additional fields (default),

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Types of communities to return: 'admin' - to return communities administered by the user , 'editor' - to return communities where the user is an administrator or editor, 'moder' - to return communities where the user is an administrator, editor, or moderator, 'groups' - to return only groups, 'publics' - to return only public pages, 'events' - to return only events

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Profile fields to return.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of communities.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of communities to return.

methods.name: groups.getAddresses
methods.description: Returns a list of community addresses.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID or screen name of the community.

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude of  the user geo position.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude of the user geo position.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of community addresses.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of community addresses to return.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Address fields

methods.name: groups.getBanned
methods.description: Returns a list of users on a community blacklist.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of users.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of users to return.

methods.name: groups.getById
methods.description: Returns information about communities by their IDs.

parameters.name: group_ids
parameters.description: IDs or screen names of communities.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID or screen name of the community.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Group fields to return.

methods.name: groups.getCallbackConfirmationCode
methods.description: Returns Callback API confirmation code for the community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

methods.name: groups.getCallbackSettings
methods.description: Returns [vk.com/dev/callback_api|Callback API] notifications settings.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: server_id
parameters.description: Server ID.

methods.name: groups.getCatalogInfo
methods.description: Returns categories list for communities catalog

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: 1 - to return communities count and three communities for preview. By default: 0.

parameters.name: subcategories
parameters.description: 1 - to return subcategories info. By default: 0.

methods.name: groups.getInvitedUsers
methods.description: Returns invited users list of a community

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Group ID to return invited users for.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of results.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of results to return.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of additional fields to be returned. Available values: 'sex, bdate, city, country, photo_50, photo_100, photo_200_orig, photo_200, photo_400_orig, photo_max, photo_max_orig, online, online_mobile, lists, domain, has_mobile, contacts, connections, site, education, universities, schools, can_post, can_see_all_posts, can_see_audio, can_write_private_message, status, last_seen, common_count, relation, relatives, counters'.

parameters.name: name_case
parameters.description: Case for declension of user name and surname. Possible values: *'nom' - nominative (default),, *'gen' - genitive,, *'dat' - dative,, *'acc' - accusative, , *'ins' - instrumental,, *'abl' - prepositional.

methods.name: groups.getInvites
methods.description: Returns a list of invitations to join communities and events.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of invitations.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of invitations to return.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return additional [vk.com/dev/fields_groups|fields] for communities..

methods.name: groups.getLongPollServer
methods.description: Returns the data needed to query a Long Poll server for events

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

methods.name: groups.getLongPollSettings
methods.description: Returns Long Poll notification settings

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

methods.name: groups.getMembers
methods.description: Returns a list of community members.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID or screen name of the community.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order. Available values: 'id_asc', 'id_desc', 'time_asc', 'time_desc'. 'time_asc' and 'time_desc' are availavle only if the method is called by the group's 'moderator'.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of community members.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of community members to return.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: List of additional fields to be returned. Available values: 'sex, bdate, city, country, photo_50, photo_100, photo_200_orig, photo_200, photo_400_orig, photo_max, photo_max_orig, online, online_mobile, lists, domain, has_mobile, contacts, connections, site, education, universities, schools, can_post, can_see_all_posts, can_see_audio, can_write_private_message, status, last_seen, common_count, relation, relatives, counters'.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: *'friends' - only friends in this community will be returned,, *'unsure' - only those who pressed 'I may attend' will be returned (if it's an event).

methods.name: groups.getRequests
methods.description: Returns a list of requests to the community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of results.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of results to return.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Profile fields to return.

methods.name: groups.getSettings
methods.description: Returns community settings.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

methods.name: groups.getTagList
methods.description: List of group's tags

methods.name: groups.invite
methods.description: Allows to invite friends to the community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

parameters.name: user_ids_list
parameters.description: User IDs.

methods.name: groups.isMember
methods.description: Returns information specifying whether a user is a member of a community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID or screen name of the community.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

parameters.name: user_ids
parameters.description: User IDs.

parameters.name: extended
parameters.description: '1' - to return an extended response with additional fields. By default: '0'.

response.description: Information whether user is a member of the group

methods.name: groups.join
methods.description: With this method you can join the group or public page, and also confirm your participation in an event.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID or screen name of the community.

parameters.name: not_sure
parameters.description: Optional parameter which is taken into account when 'gid' belongs to the event: '1' - Perhaps I will attend, '0' - I will be there for sure (default), ,

methods.name: groups.leave
methods.description: With this method you can leave a group, public page, or event.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: ID or screen name of the community.

methods.name: groups.removeUser
methods.description: Removes a user from the community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: User ID.

methods.name: groups.reorderLink
methods.description: Allows to reorder links in the community.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: link_id
parameters.description: Link ID.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: ID of the link after which to place the link with 'link_id'.

methods.name: groups.search
methods.description: Returns a list of communities matching the search criteria.

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query string.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Community type. Possible values: 'group, page, event.'

parameters.name: country_id
parameters.description: Country ID.

parameters.name: city_id
parameters.description: City ID. If this parameter is transmitted, country_id is ignored.

parameters.name: future
parameters.description: '1' - to return only upcoming events. Works with the 'type' = 'event' only.

parameters.name: market
parameters.description: '1' - to return communities with enabled market only.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort order. Possible values: *'0' - default sorting (similar the full version of the site),, *'1' - by growth speed,, *'2'- by the "day attendance/members number" ratio,, *'3' - by the "Likes number/members number" ratio,, *'4' - by the "comments number/members number" ratio,, *'5' - by the "boards entries number/members number" ratio.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Offset needed to return a specific subset of results.

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: Number of communities to return. "Note that you can not receive more than first thousand of results, regardless of 'count' and 'offset' values."

methods.name: groups.setCallbackSettings
methods.description: Allow to set notifications settings for group.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Community ID.

parameters.name: server_id
parameters.description: Server ID.

parameters.name: message_new
parameters.description: A new incoming message has been received ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: message_reply
parameters.description: A new outcoming message has been received ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: message_allow
parameters.description: Allowed messages notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: message_deny
parameters.description: Denied messages notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: message_read
parameters.description: Messages read notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: photo_new
parameters.description: New photos notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: audio_new
parameters.description: New audios notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: video_new
parameters.description: New videos notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: wall_reply_new
parameters.description: New wall replies notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: wall_reply_edit
parameters.description: Wall replies edited notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: wall_reply_delete
parameters.description: A wall comment has been deleted ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: wall_reply_restore
parameters.description: A wall comment has been restored ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: wall_post_new
parameters.description: New wall posts notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: wall_repost
parameters.description: New wall posts notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: wall_schedule_post_new
parameters.description: Scheduled post added to time slot ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: wall_schedule_post_delete
parameters.description: Scheduled post removed from time slot ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: board_post_new
parameters.description: New board posts notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: board_post_edit
parameters.description: Board posts edited notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: board_post_restore
parameters.description: Board posts restored notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: board_post_delete
parameters.description: Board posts deleted notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: photo_comment_new
parameters.description: New comment to photo notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: photo_comment_edit
parameters.description: A photo comment has been edited ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: photo_comment_delete
parameters.description: A photo comment has been deleted ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: photo_comment_restore
parameters.description: A photo comment has been restored ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: video_comment_new
parameters.description: New comment to video notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: video_comment_edit
parameters.description: A video comment has been edited ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: video_comment_delete
parameters.description: A video comment has been deleted ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: video_comment_restore
parameters.description: A video comment has been restored ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: market_comment_new
parameters.description: New comment to market item notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: market_comment_edit
parameters.description: A market comment has been edited ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: market_comment_delete
parameters.description: A market comment has been deleted ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: market_comment_restore
parameters.description: A market comment has been restored ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: poll_vote_new
parameters.description: A vote in a public poll has been added ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: group_join
parameters.description: Joined community notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: group_leave
parameters.description: Left community notifications ('0' - disabled, '1' - enabled).

parameters.name: user_block
parameters.description: User added to community blacklist

parameters.name: user_unblock
parameters.description: User removed from community blacklist

parameters.name: lead_forms_new
parameters.description: New form in lead forms

parameters.name: bots_capabilities
parameters.description: By enabling bot abilities, you can send users messages with a customized keyboard attached as well as use other promotional abilities

parameters.name: bots_start_button
parameters.description: If this setting is enabled, users will see a Start button when they start a chat with your community for the first time

parameters.name: bots_add_to_chat
parameters.description: If this setting is enabled then users can add your community to a chat

parameters.name: bot_online_booking_enabled
parameters.description: If this setting is enabled then online booking chatbot add in your community chats
